# WebGIS Course Assignment 2: Interactive Map with Geocoding and Weather Data

## Project Overview
This project implements an interactive web mapping application using OpenLayers library with integrated geocoding and weather data functionality. The application allows users to search for locations, view them on an interactive map, and get real-time weather information by clicking anywhere on the map.

## Features

### 1. Interactive Map
- OpenLayers-based interactive map with multiple base layers
- Smooth zoom and pan animations
- Custom controls (zoom, fullscreen, scale line)
- Responsive design for all screen sizes

### 2. Geocoding Search
- Search for any location worldwide
- Integration with OpenCage Geocoding API
- Automatic map centering and zooming to search results
- Visual markers for searched locations

### 3. Weather Data Display
- Click anywhere on the map to get weather data
- Integration with OpenWeatherMap API
- Detailed weather information display
- Dynamic weather icons based on conditions

### 4. Additional Features
- Current location detection
- Loading states and error handling
- API comparison information
- Responsive design
